Crypto.com is honored to have met with His Highness @MaktoumMohammed, Deputy Ruler of Dubai, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance. We are grateful for the opportunity to explore areas of mutual cooperation in both digital assets and advanced financial technologies and hear his vision for the Emirate.

Dubai and the UAE continue to demonstrate a world class attitude towards innovation and progression and is a leader in fostering exceptional talent coupled with unbridled ambition. This is a powerful combination when it comes to delivering a cutting edge environment for the next generation of finance. Crypto.com is at the forefront of this financial revolution and with the ongoing support of Dubai we look forward to building the future of finance for the next generation.

📱 How to start swapping on Berachain in Crypto.com Onchain: 

1️⃣ Tap the the ‘Trade’ icon > Swap & Bridge > ‘Token Ticker’ icon
2️⃣ Under Paying Token, tap More > Berachain. Select the token you wish to swap.
3️⃣ Tap Choose Token and select the desired token under Receiving Token
4️⃣ Confirm the transaction

ℹ️ Berachain is an Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-identical Layer-1 blockchain that leverages the BeaconKit framework and uses a Proof of Liquidity (PoL) consensus mechanism.
